title: Ashvir Singh Johal takes charge at Morecambe and becomes first British Sikh to manage in England's top five leagues
description: The debt-laden Lancashire club has been at risk of collapse but a recent takeover looks to have pulled it back from the brink.
content:
Ashvir Singh Johal has become the first British Sikh to take charge of a men's team in the top five leagues of English football.
Morecambe FC confirmed him as manager two days after the approval of its takeover by consortium Panjab Warriors - and a d... [1644 chars]

title: The ‘big church move’: Swedish town begins to roll historic building 5km
description: Kiruna Kyrka’s slow journey is part of effort to stop town being swallowed by Europe’s biggest underground mine
content:
After eight years of planning, an estimated cost of 500m kronor (£39m) and an early morning blessing, a church in northern Sweden began a slow-motion 5km journey on Tuesday to make way for the expansion of Europe’s biggest underground mine.

title: BBC says it delayed Ozzy Osbourne documentary at family’s request
description: Broadcaster says family wants ‘to wait a bit longer’, after film about singer’s final years pulled from Monday’s listings
content:
The BBC has revealed it delayed an hour-long documentary about Ozzy Osbourne at the last minute at the request of his family.
